system.description:
This many-beaded necklace helps mark prayers. Of the many types of gemstone beads, [[/r 1d4+2]] are magical and can be removed from the necklace as a bonus action to cast a spell (described on Table: Necklace of Prayer Beads). There are 6 types of magic beads, and which are on the necklace are randomly determined or chosen by the Narrator.

A necklace can have multiple beads of the same type. To use a bead, you must be wearing the necklace, and if it requires a spell save you use your spell save
DC. Once a bead has been used, it loses its magic until the next dawn

TABLE: NECKLACE OF PRAYER BEADS
D20 - BEAD OF - SPELL

1–6 Blessing - @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.iuy8bgmwgvhtgi83]{Bless}
7–12 Curing - @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.n38oneuah7io59c9]{Cure Wounds} (2nd-level) or @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.g7bleenmf2e7ab6q]{Lesser Restoration}
13–16 Favor - @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.4funxoycwvh6d5p9]{Greater Restoration}
17–18 Invigorating - @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.cydwiqcwewvdpsps]{Invigorated Strikes}
19 Summons - @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.z17kiyvx36jh2tbs]{Planar Ally}
20 Wind - @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.rsqykeg9uwp6utdb]{Wind Walk}
